item.description:
Time to kick off the monthly events and get this party started.
Lots of groups will be posting the event so should be a great crowd and always plenty of new faces.
Plenty of dance room on the big floor / Great appetizers / Free Parking
DJ spinning the best dance tunes and your request /
Doors open at 8pm $10 cover

You can also register for a chance to get in free at www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com all you have to do is send them an email and let them know you are coming.  Winners name will be at the front door.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a couple of tables reserved.
item.name: Let's get this party started! Ring in Spring dance.
